name: Outrunner 198X
description:
Featuring music from retrowave project Rockit Maxx, Outrunner 198X is an unabashedly 80s rhythm game. Prove yourself by getting the most points possible along the road. Weave in between the cones on the road, and don't hit the barriers and wreck your car! It's expensive! Do you have what it takes?

Only three out of seven levels are playable at this moment; the rest will be added over the weekend along with your guys' feedback, so stay tuned!

Controls:

W/A, Left Arrow/Right Arrow = move car left/right

Escape = Pause
